channel.description: Recent content in Poly on Bennett Notes

item.title: Google Poly API Javascript and NodeJS
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: Google has been working on an interesting project called Poly. With Poly, you have access to hundreds of 3D objects that can be used to build VR games or with AR content. The interesting about Poly is that all of the graphics are available on demand. Think of it like Google Fonts just for 3D objects. So let’s take a look at how you can get started with Google Poly API Javascript and NodeJS bundle.
